title: 250 new jobs for Orange Line Train project: Asim Bajwa
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 1 (APP): Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on Information and Broadcasting and Chairman China Pakistan Economic Corridor, Lt. Gen (retd) Asim Saleem Bajwa on Tuesday said 250 new jobs had been announced for Orange Line Train project.
“As many as 250 new jobs of various categories for Orange Train Lahore have been announced by the operator,” he tweeted.
250 new jobs of various categories for Orange Train Lahore by the operator.All applications can be sent to careers@olmrts.com.pk #cpec #cpecmakingprogres pic.twitter.com/h8JvnH3ftH
— Asim Saleem Bajwa (@AsimSBajwa) September 1, 2020
He advised the applicants to email their applications for the posts to “careers@olmrts.com.pk”.
